External Job Description
Purpose / Objective of the Role
The purpose of the role is to provide analysis, support and insights to Division Leadership (Sales Directors, Marketing Director, VP of Sales and GM). The SAM will utilize business reporting systems to identify market opportunities with actionable recommendations and insights.
​
Top 3 - 5 Accountabilities of this role
  • Sales Leadership: Proactively Develop Division focused insights/opportunities thru analytics, uncovering additional volume/value & market share opportunities. Develop presentations to communicate insights to Sr Mgmt., as well as track progress against these initiatives. Example: Scotch & Multicultural Projects. Prepares / Coordinates Presentation Documents for Meetings: GSM, State Liquor Board Presentations, etc.
  • Manage / Update Relevant & Timely Market Profiles & Account Universe Maintenance by state across all 17 states
  • Work Closely with 3rd Party Platforms (GSC & SFA) & Broker SAM's on Performance Reporting
Qualifications and Experience/Skills Required
  • BA Required.
  • Experience working in a cross-functional team. 5 to 7 years’ experience of consumer products & /or three-tier consumer products organization. Prior Experience in managing multiple projects and working with large amounts of data.
  • Excellent excel skills, with mastery of pivot tables and advanced formulas. MicroStrategy helpful, but not necessary.
  • Must have excellent analytical organizational, computer & communication skills. Working knowledge of functions within the consumer products industry.
  • Work effectively with cross-functional teams. Utilizing commercial acumen & analytics to be a "thought Partner" with the sales & marketing teams to drive optimal business decisions & outcomes.
